title: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  Gens Shadwell and Wire, Mersing 1941

physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph. It features two men sitting casually on rocks by the sea. The man on the left is dressed in military uniform
 with short sleeves and pants
 long socks and shoes. Both men are wearing hats. The edges of the photograph are uneven.

sgcool_label_text:A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony
 this collection is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.title_text: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  Gens Shadwell and Wire, Mersing 1941
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features two men sitting casually on rocks by the sea. The man on the left is dressed in military uniform, with short sleeves and pants, long socks and shoes. Both men are wearing hats. The edges of the photograph are uneven.
metadata.context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
